channel.title: Multi shop (317 delta source)
channel.description:
is there a way i can make an npc have more context menu items like :
[ul][*]Talk-to "NPC NAME" [*]Low pk shop [*]Medium pk shop [*]High pk shop [*]Walk Here [*]Examine "NPC NAME" [*]Cancel[/ul]

item.title: Multi shop (317 delta source)
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

It’s possible but I’m not sure of the limit the post above me says you can only have 3 but I’m not sure.
Try this, Client Sided:

  1. Open Class5.java (this has all your custom NPCs)

Search for:

And on top of that add:

if(i == ####) { //change #### to your npc id Class5.aStringArray66[0] = "Talk-to"; //YOU CAN CHANGE THIS Class5.aStringArray66[2] = "Trade"; //YOU CAN CHANGE THIS Class5.aStringArray66[3] = "Bank"; //YOU CAN CHANGE THIS Class5.aString65 = "Your Npc"; //npc name Class5.aByteArray89 = "any thing here .... examine".getBytes(); //examine info }

When you right click the Npc it should have whatever you changed the text to.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi shop (317 delta source)
item.dc:creator: @ringster2 ringster2
item.description:
@ringster2 wrote:

[quote="`ZeroScape, post:7, topic:337034"]Everything is possible!
The impossible made possible!

I’m not a great Client-coder myself - I wish you good luck.
Attempt and I’m sure you figure out how it’s done :)[/quote]
are you sure eveything is possible? try licking you own elbow (:

[quote=“FusionLord, post:1, topic:337034”]is there a way i can make an npc have more context menu items like :

[ul][]Talk-to “NPC NAME”
[]Low pk shop
[]Medium pk shop
[]High pk shop
[]Walk Here
[]Examine “NPC NAME”
[*]Cancel[/ul][/quote]

you cant do it becuase you can only have a maximum of 3 options to an npc…
talk to
trade
teleport
just lik aubury he has 3 options…so maximum is 3

Read full topic
